preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 150 grams of aluminum, 600 grams of cobalt, 450 grams of erbium, and 75 grams of yttrium using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the aluminum and cobalt first. Stir thoroughly to ensure an even mixture. 
 3. Gradually add erbium to the aluminum-cobalt mixture while stirring continuously. 
 4. Finally, incorporate yttrium into the mixture, ensuring uniform distribution of all ingredients.
